title: Bakhtiari migration. [Edited version]
creator_credit: Anthony Howarth, David Koff and Anthony-David Productions
brief_description: An excellent record of one of the most hazardous feats of human endurance still undertaken. Shows the way in which half a million people together with millions of valuable sheep, goats, mules, and dogs struggle for five weeks to make the two hundred mile crossing of the Zagros mountains in southern Iran.
